mainText:
Steve, I never knew you in this life, but I wish you good fortune and a 
meeting in passing during the next life.  I honestly thank you for the 
contributions you have made and the wonders you have bestowed upon us 
all.  Finally I thank you for getting me started on a path that could 
have gotten me nowhere but has led me to my thirst for knowledge in all 
things geek.

This is dedicated in loving memory to an icon in the Information Age.  
May we continue to move forward and further our capabilities.
author: Nikolas
